title: Two girls dead after drowning in Kurunegala
content: Two teenage girls aged 13 and 14 have drowned in the Wilbawa Wewa in Kurunagala, on Tuesday (15).On Tuesday at around 4.30 pm, four girls had gone to swim in Wilbawa Wewa with the mother of one child in the group.The four students had drowned while swimming and were rescued by the residents of the area.Two students who were in critical condition have been admitted to the Kurunagala Teaching Hospital.
